scripts.lint: npm run lint-scss && npm run lint-js && npm run lint-toml
scripts.validate-iiif-gnu: find docs -name manifest.json -print0 | xargs -r -0 -n1 npm run eslint -c themes/projektemacher-base/eslint.config.mjs
scripts.validate-gjson-gnu: find docs -name '*.gjson' -o -name '*.geojson' -print0 | xargs -r -0 -n1 npm run eslint -c themes/projektemacher-base/eslint.config.mjs
scripts.validate-iiif-bsd: find docs -name manifest.json -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 npm run eslint -c themes/projektemacher-base/eslint.config.mjs
scripts.validate-gjson-bsd: find docs -name '*.gjson' -o -name '*.geojson' -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 npm run eslint -c themes/projektemacher-base/eslint.config.mjs
scripts.validate-iiif: case $OSTYPE in darwin*) npm run validate-iiif-bsd ;; linux*) npm run validate-iiif-gnu ;; bsd*) npm run validate-iiif-bsd ;; *)  exit 100 ;; esac
scripts.validate-gjson: case $OSTYPE in darwin*) npm run validate-gjson-bsd ;; linux*) npm run validate-gjson-gnu ;; bsd*) npm run validate-gjson-bsd ;; *)  exit 100 ;; esac
scripts.validate: npm run validate-iiif && npm run validate-gjson
